pathAssistantSteps.info: Well done. Successful end of the Lead lifecycle, indicating that the prospective customer has been fully qualified and is ready to enter the sales pipeline. Salesforce automatically creates an Account, a Contact, and a new Opportunity record to track the potential revenue (commission) generated by the inquiry. The original Lead record becomes read-only and serves as a historical record of the initial successful engagement.

It's the end of the Lead lifecycle when the prospect is deemed unqualified or unresponsive, and no Opportunity is created. This status indicates a failure in the qualification process, often due to factors like poor fit, lack of budget, or loss to competition.
Contact the person to gather more key information about the lead. The email or phone number is on the right.
